item.title: About MTBikers Club
item.description: The MTBikers Club was created with the idea of getting like-minded mountain bikers together, organising rides, and having a friendly community.

item.title: How to set the corect tyre pressure
item.description: A step by step guide 1. Go softer than you think It is very easy to inflate. Less is more 2. Go for a ride and test it
